name: Hide my site
author: Jefs Pereira

sections.description:
Block access to your site fast way while this production.
This is a great tool for someone setting up a development version of a wordpress site or anyone else looking to hide their site from the public.

sections.installation:
From WP admin > Plugins > Add New

Search “Hide My Site” under search and hit Enter

Click “Install Now”

Click the Activate Plugin link

Insert this code ” do_shortcode(‘[redirect]’); ” in the first line of the file “header.php” of your theme.
